trends: There have been 10 other sightings in St Joseph
There were no other sightings in St Joseph on or around November 26th 2012
Summary: bright light with a huge trail of smoke falling fast twards the ground then stopped hovered for awhile then flew south airplanes checking it out
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and two friends were driving I looked info the sky saw a bright object falling towards earth with a huge trail of smoke then it just stopped hovered and then I noticed airplanes flying to it and around it checking it out, then it flew off south, then I looked over to the west and seen another one hovering. I have never seen anything like this in my life and truthfully I'm scarred.
